articles.description: Lockdown rules have been local or national, early or late, partial or total and obligatory or voluntary. The differing impact on traffic flows shows how the restrictions evolved in different cities worldwide, where they’re loosening, and where they’re coming …
articles.content: The location technology company and satnav maker TomTom reports a traffic index for hundreds of cities based in part on data from satnav users. The index suggests how much longer a journey would take to complete than in ideal conditions. In Paris, for instanc… [+2095 chars]

articles.title: Apex Legends Season 5 teaser reveals size of new Kings Canyon location - Dexerto
articles.description: The newest Apex Legends Season 5 teaser has seemingly revealed the vast size of the highly-teased future location for Kings Canyon.
articles.content:
An Apex Legends season five teaser has seemingly revealed the huge size of a new location coming to Kings Canyon – and it’s safe to say the map is in for a pretty major makeover.

articles.author: Aaron Brown
articles.title: iPhone users warned: Viewing this text can crash any Apple smartphone - Express
articles.description: WATCH OUT, iPhone owners! Apple smartphones can be crashed by a string of text sent in text messages or shared on websites or online forums. The text causes your iPhone to freeze.

articles.author: Gareth Corfield
articles.title: We could have pwned Microsoft Teams with a GIF, claims Israeli infosec outfit - The Register
articles.description: Proof-of-concept vuln patched a week ago
articles.content:
A vulnerability existed in Microsoft's Slack for Suits tool, Teams, that could have let a remote attacker take over accounts by simply sending a malicious GIF, infosec researchers claim.
The pwn-with-GIF vuln was possible, said Cyberark, thanks to two compro… [+2312 chars]
